ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from using Named User as a Meter Type for certain products unless they are part of a bundle.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.SBQQ__ProductCode__c <>"CR-01456", OR( SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "EX-00830", SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "RI-01417", SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "RI-01420" ), ISPICKVAL(Meter_Type__c, "Named Users"), OR( $User.Id <> "00550000002q64G", $Profile.Id <> "00e50000001BmUZ" ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Meter Type Named User cannot be used for these products unless they are part of the OnePlace for Marketing solution.
